alert.note: Alert for East Carteret; Ocracoke Island (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 04 at 10:12AM EST until January 04 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along the lower Neuse River, Pamlico, Core and Back Sounds, and adjacent tidal creeks, and areas along the beaches, Pamlico Sound, and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...Until early this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Up to 2 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in typically flood prone areas near shorelines and tidal waterways resulting in an elevated threat of property damage. Flooding of very low-lying roads, parking lots and properties possible in and around Ocracoke Village, Downeast Carteret County, and Beaufort. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Beaufort Marine Lab NC MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 5.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor -0.8 ft, Moderate -0.3 ft, Major 0.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 04/09 AM 6.1 0.3 2.2 1 Moderate 04/10 PM 4.3 -1.5 1.6 1 None 05/10 AM 5.4 -0.4 1.7 1 Moderate 05/10 PM 4.0 -1.8 1.3 1 None 06/11 AM 4.9 -0.9 1.5 1 None 06/11 PM 4.1 -1.7 1.4 1 None Ocracoke Inlet NC MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.9 ft, Moderate 2.9 ft, Major 4.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 04/09 AM 3.6 2.5 2.2 2 Minor 04/08 PM 2.6 1.5 1.7 1 None 05/09 AM 2.9 1.8 1.6 2 None 05/09 PM 2.6 1.5 1.7 1-2 None 06/10 AM 2.9 1.8 1.7 1 None 06/11 PM 2.7 1.6 1.7 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
